content:
Based on the execution logs and entity data, I'll generate a report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position x=0-2, y=0)
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Stone furnace 1 (position x=0, y=0) processing iron ore into plates
- Stone furnace 2 (position x=2, y=0) processing iron ore into plates
Both furnaces are operational with coal fuel and iron ore input

### Copper Plate Production Area (Position x=4, y=4)
Single stone furnace processing copper ore into copper plates
- Stone furnace (position x=4, y=4) with coal fuel and copper ore input

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Assembly line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest (position x=6.5, y=11.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=7.5, y=11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine 1 (position x=9.5, y=11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter (position x=11.5, y=11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest (position x=12.5, y=11.5) storing finished electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-26.5)
Steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting water supply
- Boiler (position x=-7.0, y=24.5) heating water into steam
- Steam engine (position x=-2.5, y=24.5) generating electricity
- Connected to electrical network through poles

### Science Pack Processing (Position x=0.5, y=28.5-31.5)
Science setup consisting of:
- Lab for research
- Burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest (position x=0.5, y=31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Research Prerequisites Not Met
- Ensure all prerequisite technologies are researched before attempting new research
- Follow the technology tree progression:
  - Need fluid-handling before oil-processing
  - Need oil-processing before sulfur-processing and plastics
  - Need production-science-pack prerequisites before logistics-3
  - Need plastics before advanced-electronics

### Already Researched Technologies
- Avoid attempting to research already completed technologies (logistics-2, advanced-material-processing, electronics, steel-processing, automation-2)

### Fuel Management Issues
- Monitor and maintain coal levels in boilers and burner devices
- Ensure sufficient coal is available in inventory before attempting to refuel

### Invalid Technology References
- Use correct technology names when setting research (EngineUnit was invalid)
